messages.title: After nearly a decade of cuts, it's time for real change.
messages.content: Labour will rebuild and transform Britain, so that no one is held back and no community is left behind.

messages.title: THE FUTURE IS OURS TO MAKE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in our NHS to provide more doctors and nurses and cut waiting times.
Invest in our schools and provide free lifelong learning for everyone.
Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the Climate Emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs.
Bring rail, water and energy into public ownership to give you a better deal.
Introduce a real living wage, ban zero hours contracts and strengthen workers' rights.
Give you the final say on Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Give you the final say on Brexit.
issues.economy: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the Climate Emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs. Introduce a real living wage, ban zero hours contracts and strengthen workers' rights.
issues.education: Invest in our schools and provide free lifelong learning for everyone.
issues.environment: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the Climate Emergency.
issues.health: Invest in our NHS to provide more doctors and nurses and cut waiting times.

contactInformation.address: The Labour Party, c/o Poets Print UK, Atlas House, Nelson Park, Cramlington, Northumberland, NE23 1WG

leaflet.additionalNotes: FOR THE MANY NOT THE FEW
